definition: to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
to get to know each other/acquaintance
to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
to gain first-hand knowledge of sth/to experience for oneself/knowledge/experience/insight

sentences.english: They say she plays guitar and cries and sings.
sentences.chinese: 大家都話她識彈結他，又識鬼咁叫同唱歌仔。

sentences.english: The royal standard flies when the Queen is in residence.
sentences.chinese: 女王的王宮及駐蹕處均有王旗爲識。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a face recognition algorithm based on Fisherface method.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於費歇爾方法的人臉識算法。

sentences.english: The royal standard flies when the queen is in residence .
sentences.chinese: 女王的王宮及居住處均有王旗爲識。

sentences.english: The teacher called me up and very angry to answer questions, "Hello knowledge matter?"
sentences.chinese: 老師很氣就叫我起來回答問題“你好識啦？

sentences.english: The legend of "Gongye Chang could understand bird's language" began about 1500 or 1600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: “公冶長識鳥語”傳說約產生於一千五六百年前。

sentences.english: How do you think your inability to recognize faces affected the development of your social life?
sentences.chinese: 你如何看待無法識認人面對你社交生活發展的影響？

sentences.english: Fire proves gold, adversity proves men. -- L. A.
sentences.chinese: Seneca烈火煉真金，逆境識真人。

sentences.english: Be famous for three decades, but until now no one know my appearance;
sentences.chinese: 江湖成名三十載，至今無人識真彩。

sentences.english: Fire proves gold, adversity proves men.
sentences.chinese: 烈火顯真金，逆境識英雄。

sentences.english: Only their own people in all its aspects has been recognized only someone know Chollima .
sentences.chinese: 只有自己的各方面得到人家認可纔會有人識千里馬。

sentences.english: Cauliflower is nothing but a cabbage with a college education.
sentences.chinese: 譯成大白話就是“甘藍識了字，就叫花菜了”。

sentences.english: Fire proves gold, adversity proves man.
sentences.chinese: 猛火識真金，逆境識英雄。

sentences.english: Fire proves gold, adversity proves man.
sentences.chinese: 猛火識真金，逆境識英雄。

sentences.english: Then I inquired just ottomssion him if he knew a powerfulybody in New York .
sentences.chinese: 接着我就問他能否定識在紐約的人？

sentences.english: Dr Wong's contribution to general education has many facets.
sentences.chinese: 王永雄博士對中大通識教育貢獻良多。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
